user.subTitle: I also am a proud dad, husband, son, brother and coder
user.description:
I am an Innovative Front End Developer offering {autoexp} years of experience in the full software development life cycle - from concept through delivery of next-generation applications and customisable solutions.
Expert in advanced development methodologies, tools and processes contributing to the design and rollout of cutting-edge web applications.
Known for excellent troubleshooting skills - able to analyse code and engineer well-researched, cost-effective and responsive solutions.

experiences.description: I involved in a large banking project called "Avalon". Developed many frontend interfaces for banking clients using ReactJS and Redux.

achievements.details: Contributed frontend expertise in the development of products through the software life cycle, from requirements definition through successful deployment.
Excelled in agile software development and management of technological issues, earning the highest customer satisfaction rating for all software solutions delivered.

experiences.other: Building front end code base and libraries, writing test cases and TDD, team management, monitoring junior developers, post-sale support and maintenance.

experiences.description: I involved in many client faced apps development for gambling industries. AngularJS, Angular, ReactJS, TypeScript are few to name the technologies used to develop the apps.

achievements.details: Introduced methodologies and best practices that enhanced product definition, release processes and customization of applications to user needs.

experiences.other: Building front end shared components, testing, monitoring, support and maintenance.

experiences.description: I worked on a project called "Intuitive Dashboards" - which is a data visualisation tool and I developed frontend (Single Page web Application) using cutting-edge technologies like JavaScript (VanillaJS, Kendo UI, BackboneJS, UnderscoreJS, RequireJS, jQuery, ReactJS), HTML5 and CSS3.

achievements.details: Facilitated customization of Intuitive Dashboards by encouraging other developers to adopt emerging standards for web app development, architecture and tools.

Participated in partners’ conference due to ability to translate user needs into easy-to-understand software solutions. Helped sales/professional delivery team close major deals generating more than £100K in revenue over years.

experiences.other: Decoupling front-end from back end, prototyping, UI/UX design and development, testing, database management, client management, post-sale support and maintenance.

experiences.description: I assisted in design and development of Patient Appointment Confirmation Service and Telephone Answering Service application for NHS Trusts.

achievements.details: Provided user requirements analysis, design and programming support for enhancement of web application accessed by roughly 25k NHS users every day.
Fuelled additional revenue stream through responsive customer support, generating £20K in new license sales within first few weeks of new product release.

experiences.other: Brand development, web site functionality and UI enhancement using JavaScript/HTML/CSS, application development using C# and deployment and support.

experiences.description: I worked on the project Customer Loyalty Solution. The former software application was targeted to small retailers. I was responsible for requirement analysis, impact analysis, application development using C# and testing, install and configuration, post-sale support and maintenance.

I worked on UI Design for developing Rich Internet Applications (m-RIA) framework and mobile applications. I was responsible for prototyping, pictographs, research on User Interface Design Process and Usability Standards.
I worked along with Network and Systems maintenance team to provide the best service, supported about 75 networked systems, phone systems in the organisation.

projects.title: Neon Floors
projects.description:
Neon Floors is a web application, will let casinos to setup their attractive floor plan with assets and track players activity on the floor live and more.
App will also allow casino operators to send promotions, alerts and manage player glabling behaviours.

subProjects.title: Floorlens
subProjects.description: View live player activities and floor operation

projects.title: Neon Analytics
projects.description: <q>Neon Analytics</q> is a data visualisation platform for casinos using the IGS' Neon service. It  integrates vast amounts of transactional data from disparate casino source cubes. It helps to run casinos business intelligence by retrieving, analyzing, transforming and reporting data.

projects.title: Neon Touch
projects.description:
Neon Touch is browser based app runs on touch device of the slot machines. App is developed using Angular and .net Core.
App talks to service fabric microservices and web sockets.

projects.title: Customer Query Builder
projects.description: Searching tool for large customer base for casinos

projects.title: Neon Mix
projects.description:
Neon Mix is browser based app runs on slot machines in kiosk mode. App is developed using Angular and .net Core.
App talks to service fabric microservices and web sockets.

projects.title: TableLite
projects.description:
TableLite is a modern browser based application built using technologies like AngularJS (v1.7) and .Net Core (v2.1). Application can be hosted on any platform (WIndows/Linux/OSX). Front end communicates with server over Restful API (Web API).
The app helps the casinos to track the cash drops on a gambling table.

projects.title: Intuitive Dashboards
projects.description: <q>Intuitive Dashboards</q> is a data visualisation tool developed using cutting-edge technologies like JavaScript (VanillaJS, Kendo UI, BackboneJS, UnderscoreJS, RequireJS, jQuery, ReactJS), HTML5 and CSS3. Web application consumes RESTful API (WCF service) built on.Net framework on top of SQL database - which is the backbone for the whole application. Dashboard Web Client is a targeting the current Mobile users and PC users - the aim is to make one application compatible with all screen sized devices in the market without using any browser plug-ins.

projects.title: Server Tools
projects.description: The tool is aimed to perform cloning the dashboard database entities into XML file then migrate them to another dashboard database. This provides entity portability, in turn, helps the existing Business intelligence software users to backup/build/enhance the migrated dashboards on their system.

projects.title: Security Filters and Dashboard API
projects.description: Aim of the security filter is to provide overall security to the data used by existing Business Intelligence software, where URL parameters are encrypted and passed across the servers and other security features at datasets level. A Test Harness (Windows application) is developed to test these security features. Also an API is developed for other developers of the other software to consume dashboard service.

projects.title: Chronos
projects.description: <q>Chronos</q> is the Patient Appointment Confirmation Service for NHS - which is a unique blend of agent calls, IVR calls, SMS and emails to remind and confirm the intentions of the NHS patients to drive down Did-Not-Attend (DNAs) rate. IVR and agent calling uses Linux free switches concept on mono run-time. Clients (NHS Trusts) use Web App, Callers use Agent App to make live calls and Supervisors use Team Leader App to monitor the agents on shift.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: The site you viewing is my personal profile. It is made with reactJS

projects.title: Quote Gun
projects.description: Quote Gun is made with VueJS. It uses the API from favq.com to display the quote

projects.title: KeyCode Vuewer
projects.description: KeyCode Vuewer is made with VueJS. On keydown it displays related keycode

projects.title: Multi-Runner Game
projects.description: It is a virtual horse race prototype - aim is to extend this app to a full blown racing game

projects.title: Clicky Bucky Game
projects.description: It is a game similar to candy crush.

projects.title: Image2PDF conveter
projects.description: Web utility to convert selected image (jpeg/jpg) file into a PDF file

topics.name: VS Code, Visual Studio, Sublime Text
